title: New: Western Affairs – Control
body:
_‘I’m afraid of what I do, the things I’ve done, the things I choose’_ – haven’t we all felt like that at some point? This new track from Washington DC based trio **Western Affairs** is a tender, heartfelt number, parking itself subtly between the strained vocals of **Youth Lagoon** and the slick electronic fuzz of **The Postal Service**.

Sure, it verges upon cheesy in sections, but there’s something endearingly touching to _Control_, that washes away any cliched sugar sweet tendencies.
